coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, Reuse this Coin (once per Skill)<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 6+ ([Combustion] + [Burst]), Coin Power +1<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Bloodflame Massacre [血炎亂舞]
levelList.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
[StartBattle] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, convert all Coins to [SuperCoin]
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [ChickenStance]
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ ([Combustion] + [Burst]), Coin Power +1
[DefeatDuel] Apply 2 [Combustion] to target and self

levelList.name: Bloodflame Massacre [血炎亂舞]
levelList.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
<style="highlight">Deal +1% damage for every 2% (missing HP percentage on target + missing HP percentage on self) (max 50%)</style>
[StartBattle] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, convert all Coins to [SuperCoin]
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [ChickenStance]
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 ([Combustion] + [Burst]) on target (max 2)</style>
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 2)</style>
[DefeatDuel] Apply 2 [Combustion] to target and self

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttackHead] Deal (10% of this Coin's final damage) bonus Gluttony damage</style>
<style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttackHead] Deal (20% of this Coin's final damage) bonus Gluttony damage against all targets</style>

levelList.name: Rooster's Deathstrike [鷄窮則殺]
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance] next turn
[WhenUse] If this unit has [ChickenStance], Coin Power +1
[DefeatDuel] Apply 2 [Combustion] to target and self

levelList.name: Rooster's Deathstrike [鷄窮則殺]
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance] next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 10+ ([Combustion] + [Burst]), Base Power +1</style>
[WhenUse] If this unit has [ChickenStance], Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] This Skill deals +1% damage for every 3% HP this unit cumulatively lost in this Encounter (max 30%)</style>
[DefeatDuel] Apply 2 [Combustion] to target and self
